Capitol Steps Records CSCD 1033

They're the best. There's no one like them, no one in their league. --Larry King

The troupe has become a favorite on the Washington social circuit. Its political satire brings chuckles...rave reviews...guffaws...and bipartisan grins all around. The satire hits the mark. --The Wall Street Journal

Product Description
The Capitol Steps newest album is FISCAL SHADES OF GRAY (2013), celebrating the new bipartisan spirit in Washington. All the greatest political comedy of the last year, from the election to the sequester, from Obama Care in the Supreme Court to gay marriage. Including guest appearances by David Petraeus, Lance Armstrong, Pope Benedict XVI, Chris Christie, and the Rolling Stones. If you're tired of hearing about Congressional gridlock, financial crises, or sex scandals, then you've come to the wrong place. With musical political satire poking fun at all sides of the issues, it's the one new thing in Washington sure to earn bipartisan support
